name: Potion Commotion (itch) (hulien22)
description:
Description

🧙 Play as an alchemist-magician captured by goblins and forced to make potions.
📝 Manage your table-space as potion orders, recipes, and ingredients get sent down the chute every 10 seconds.
⚗️ Try to keep up with the orders, and keep an eye out for a way to escape… 👀

How to play

Drag and drop ingredients onto filled potion bottles to add them to the potion.

  1. You lose lives when an order times out or when you submit the wrong potion with an order
  2. Potion orders, recipes, ingredients, or tips come from the chute every 10 seconds
  3. The cloud lets you fill potion bottles with water
  4. To submit an order, drag the order paper, and the completed potion into the goblin’s hands
  5. Use the cassette player to configure your “chill beats to make potions to” - The goblins are not that evil
  6. Use the heaters to heat your potions. Potions can be heated 2, 5, or 10 seconds
  7. The mortars and pestles and be used to grind ingredients
  8. The ingredients drawer contains all the ingredients you need
  9. The bottle drawer contains empty potion bottles
  10. Drag items onto the garbage to remove clutter from your desk

Be sure to read the in-game tips.

~Have fun and embrace the chaos!~
